text: The 2019–20 Port Vila Premier League is the 26th season of the Port Vila Premier League, the top football league in Port Vila, the capital of Vanuatu. The season was previously scheduled to begin in 20 Septemberhttps://twitter.com/VanuatuB/status/1173951035154608128/photo/1 but it was postponed to 12 Octoberhttps://oceaniafootballcenter.home.blog/2019/10/11/port-vila-premier- league-begins-this-weekend/ due to 2019 OFC Men's Olympic Qualifying Tournamenthttps://twitter.com/VanuatuB/status/1179782034744578049 that was held in Fiji between 21 September and 5 October. Tafea are the defending champions.https://dailypost.vu/vanuatu_sports/mg-tafea-fc-hemi-pvfa-premia- divisen- jampion/article_c2af81f7-a8de-5a42-a230-0f4d4328f1d6.htmlhttps://dailypost.vu/vanuatu_sports/mg- tafea-fc-and-galaxy-fc-to-kick-off- pvfa/article_5abbd5b4-9894-5094-8813-a3dcf07dd66d.html ==Teams== A total of eight teams compete in the league. Shepherds United were relegated from last season. Amicale finished their football activities and were removed from the league. They were replaced by promoted teams Sia-Raga and Mauwia.https://twitter.com/VanuatuB/status/1169805619689340929 *Erakor Golden Star *Galaxy *Ifira Black Bird *Mauwia *Sia-Raga *Tafea *Tupuji Imere *Yatel ==League table== == Results == 1st Round -
